biotools.summary: Search engine which provides an exploration of plant genomic data for forward genetic research and comprises millions of quarterly updated and indexed information from major life science databases as well as millions of evidence ranked gene annotations to associate these facts to plant genome loci. This instance serve for index of IPK hosted databases. It comprise search indexes for IPK plant genome databases, molecular databases and germplasm collections.

bioschemas.name: LAILAPS Search Engine (IPK instance)
